metadata.title: CVE-2021-44498 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in FIS GT.M through V7.0-000 (related to the YottaDB code base). Using crafted input, attackers can cause a type to be incorrectly initialized in the function f_incr in sr_port/f_incr.c and cause a crash due to a NULL pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: fis-gtm package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
